name: Evil★Twin Sun-ny
text:
2 monsters. including a "Sun-ny" monster
If this card is Special Summoned and you control a "Lu-na" monster: You can add 1 "Live☆Twin" or "Evil★Twin" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. During the Main Phase, if you do not control a "Lu-na" monster (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 "Lu-na" monster from your GY, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Fiend monsters. You can only use each effect of "Evil★Twin Sun-ny" once per turn.
